page.title: 12MUSIC
page.content: THERE ARE LOTS OF PEOPLE WHO TEACH MUSIC IN SCHOOLS AND AT HOME.MY FRIENDS TAKE PIANO ,TAMBORINE LESSONS AT HOME.THEY ALSO TAKE RECORDER, FLUTE,VIOLIN AND BRASS LESSONS IN SCHOOL. I HEAR MUSIC ON THE TELEVISON AND ON THE RADIO ALSO ON THE RECORD PLAYER.MUSIC LIKE POP SONGS AND CLASSIC AND OLD SONGS.MY MUM KNOWS MOST OLD SONGS , MY FRIENDS KNOW MOST POP SONGS AND MY GRAND MOTHER KNOWS MOST CLASSIC SONGS.THERE IS A LOT OF MUSIC ,WE HEAR IT EVERY DAY IN SCHOOL AND AT HOME.I HAVE A GUITAR AT HOME I SOMETIMES PLAY ON IT.I CAN PLAY A LITTLE TUNE BUT I CAN NOT PLAY IT VERY WELL BECAUSE I ONLY HAD IT FOR A CHRISTMAS PRESENT.
